issue.title: [Java][FlightRPC] Error metadata from FlightStatusException is not propagated to client
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12842](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12842). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It works if you use gRPC's StatusRuntimeException directly, but not if you use FlightStatusException, since the metadata isn't copied over in StatusUtils.
